Special Notes: On 1 July 1997 China resumed its exercise of sovereignty over Hong Kong; and on 20 December 1999 China resumed its exercise of sovereignty over Macao. Please note that historical data before 1999 are not actual euros and are not comparable or suitable for aggregation across countries.
